description: ESLint configuration module for a Next.js project, utilizing the FlatCompat utility to manage extended configurations.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Stores the filename path derived from the module URL.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Stores the directory path of the current file.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Method from FlatCompat used to extend ESLint configurations.
